Member Function Documentation

ContentObject org.ccnx.ccn.impl.repo.RepositoryInternalInputHandler.get ( Interest  interest,
long  timeout 
) throws IOException

Get a single piece of content from CCN.

This is a blocking get, it will return when matching content is found or it times out, whichever comes first.

Parameters:
interest 
timeout 
Returns:
the content object
